{{Actor|name=Peggy Nesbitt|lifetime=[[4 September]] [[1997]]|played=[[Sigrid]]|film=[[The Hobbit (film series)]]|imdb=[https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3955364 Profile]|played2=[[Dale]] child|film2=[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]}}

'''Peggy Nesbitt''' (born [[4 September]] [[1997]]) portrayed [[Sigrid]], a character created by [[Peter Jackson]] for [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]] and [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]. She also played (uncredited) a child of [[Dale]] in [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]].

== Family ==
* Daughter of [[James Nesbitt]] who portrayed [[Bofur]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)]]
* Daughter of [[Sonia Forbes-Adam]] who portrayed [[Belladonna Took]] in [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)]]
* Older sister of [[Mary Nesbitt]] who portrayed [[Tilda]] in The Hobbit (film series)
